bookAuthors: Jules Verne, Caleb Carr, Jordan Stump
Plot: After hijacking a balloon from a Confederate camp, a band of five northern prisoners escapes the American Civil War. Seven thousand miles later, they drop from the clouds onto an uncharted volcanic island in the Pacific. Through teamwork, scientific knowledge, engineering, and perseverance, they endeavour to build a colony from scratch. But this island of abundant resources has its secrets. The castaways discover they are not alone. A shadowy, yet familiar, agent of their unfathomable fate is watching. What unfolds in Jules Verneâ€™s imaginative marvel is both an enthralling mystery and the ultimate in survivalist adventures.
Characters: Nebuchadnezzar, Cyrus Smith, Bonadventure Pencroff, Herbert Brown, Gideon Spilett, Captain Nemo, Top, Tom Ayrton, Bob Harvey, Jupiter, Robert Grant
Setting: Richmond, Virginia (United States), Lincoln Island, Tabor Island
